title: Event Notes: The Consumer Welfare Standard Is Dead, Long Live the Standard
dc:creator: Kirk Ott
description:
It seems that the only thing academics and policymakers can agree about regarding the Consumer Welfare Standard is that it needs reforming. On April 22, Alden Abbott, Doha Mekki, Fiona Scott Morton, and Zephyr Teachout debated the meaning and future of the Consumer Welfare Standard in a panel moderated by Stigler Centerâ€™s Luigi Zingales.
